DOC.brief_summary: To study the effect of calcifediol on left ventricular remodeling, mineral metabolism, plasma levels of several prognostic biomarkers and on endothelial function after an anterior myocardial infarction.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Vitamin D on Ventricular Remodeling in Patients With Acute Myocardial Infarction (VITDAMI)
